message.entry: Unable to determine file format from filename.
Signed integer data not supported in JPEG format.
Data loss and unexpected results may occur with signed pixel data.
Unable to open file "{0}" for writing. Check write permission.
Image writing not supported for format {0}. Use imformats to identify supported formats.
Images must have fewer than 2^32 - 1 elements on each side.
Images must contain fewer than 2^32 - 1 bytes of data.
First argument must be image data specified by a numeric matrix.
Filename must be supplied as either the second or third argument.
Invalid input combination or unrecognized format "{0}".
The specified filepath "{0}" does not exist.
